metadata.title: estudio12 - Tattoo Studio with Panoramic View | Buenos Aires
metadata.description: We are a professional tattoo studio in Buenos Aires with panoramic view. Every stroke tells a story. Specialists in realism, traditional, minimalist and more. Book your consultation.

home.description: We are a professional tattoo studio with a panoramic view of one of the most beautiful cities. We know that every stroke tells a story, we create art pieces that last a lifetime.

cta.title: What's your next tattoo?
cta.description: Tell us your idea, the style and size, do you already have tattoos? The studio takes care of advising you and presenting the perfect artist for you.

metadata.og_description: Professional tattoo portfolio. Each piece tells a unique story. Specialists in multiple styles.

hero.title: About the Studio
hero.description_1: Founded in 2022, Studio 12 opened its doors in the San Telmo neighborhood, Autonomous City of Buenos Aires, with the mission of sharing the art of tattooing from a contemporary perspective, without losing the values that define it as a craft.
hero.description_2: The studio maintains constant updating and training, with the objective of offering a service according to the expectations and needs of each client.
hero.description_3: At Studio 12 we work under high standards of hygiene, safety and professionalism. We use state-of-the-art equipment and apply strict sanitary protocols to guarantee a safe, careful and comfortable experience in each session.

team.title: Our Team
team.description: Meet the artists who bring your ideas to life. Each with their unique style and passion for the art of tattooing.

guests.title: Guest Artists
guests.description: Meet the temporary artists who collaborate with us. Each brings their unique style and perspective to the studio.

cta.title: Want to work with our team?

metadata.description: Meet our team of professional artists specialized in realism, traditional, minimalist, oriental and more. Founded in 2015 with the highest standards of quality and safety.

not_found.title: Oops! This page went to get a tattoo
not_found.subtitle: 404 - Not found
not_found.message: Looks like this page escaped from the studio to get a tattoo and never came back. Meanwhile, you can explore the rest of our work.
not_found.fun_fact: Fun fact: 73.8% of 404 pages never return from their tattoo session. Maybe they just love the experience that much?
